com.tinfoil.sms.utility

Class SMSUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tinfoil.sms.utility.SMSUtility

  • public abstract class SMSUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class used to retrieve contacts information from the native database and format the data going into tinfoil-sms's database.

      • contactDisplayMaker

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> contactDisplayMaker(java.util.List<TrustedContact> tc)
        Create an array of Strings to display for the auto-complete
        Parameters:
        tc - All the TrustedContacts
        Returns:
        A list of all the contacts and their numbers for the auto complete list.

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format(java.lang.String number)
        Removes the preceding '1' or '+1' for the given number
        Parameters:
        number - The number of the contact
        Returns:
        The number without the preceding '1' or '+1'

      • sendSMS

        public static void sendSMS(Context c,
           Entry message)
        Sends the given message to the phone with the given number
        Parameters:
        number - The number of the phone that the message is sent to
        message - The message, encrypted that will be sent to the contact

      • sendToSelf

        public static void sendToSelf(Context c,
              java.lang.String srcNumber,
              java.lang.String decMessage,
              java.lang.String dest)
        Drops the message into the in-box of the default SMS program. Tricks the in-box to think the message was send by the original sender. If the user's settings are such to prevent messages from being saved to the native sms client as well the method will do nothing, there is NO need to check the user's settings outside.
        Parameters:
        c - The context of the message sending
        srcNumber - The number of the contact that sent the message
        decMessage - The message sent from the contact
        dest - The folder in the android database that the message will be stored in

      • sendMessage

        public static boolean sendMessage(DBAccessor dba,
                  Context context,
                  Entry message)
        Sends a message as encrypted or plain text based on the contact's state.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the class
        number - The number the text message is being sent to
        text - The text message
        Returns:
        boolean whether the message sent or not

      • parseAutoComplete

        public static java.lang.String[] parseAutoComplete(java.lang.String entry)
        Parse an auto-complete entry of a 'name, number'
        Parameters:
        entry - The entry that contains the 'name, number'
        Returns:
        A string array with the first element being the contact's name and the second element being the contact's number. If the given string only contains the contact's number the first element will be null.

        Parameters:
